front.title: IEEE Draft Standard - Health Informatics -- Device Interoperability -- Part 10700: Point-of-Care Medical Device Communication -- Standard for Base Requirements for Participants in a Service-Oriented Device Connectivity (SDC) System
front.abstract: This standard defines the base requirements for SDC PARTICIPANTs in a Service-Oriented Device Connectivity (SDC) System that comprises a network of MEDICAL DEVICEs in order to enable safe and secure contribution to SYSTEM FUNCTIONs.
